Title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
Writer: Gene Roddenberry (television series "Star Trek"), Leonard Nimoy (story), Lawrence Konner (story), Mark Rosenthal (story), Nicholas Meyer (screenplay), Denny Martin Flinn (screenplay)
Actors: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, James Doohan
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.
Plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.
